name: White belt
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'stunning blow'.
This item loses its magical powers fast.
